contacts.name: Regin
contacts.signature: Do not contact for non-research funding matters

111370000.text: Are you alright, friend? Did your fingers get frostbite? Did you run into any weird stuff?

111370001.text: It was so cold! I almost got frozen solid! You've gotta give me more compensation this time

111370002.text: The task was completed without a hitch, and I overcame lots of difficulties. There should be extra compensation

111370003.text: If you're still in the mood to bargain with me, then you've gotta be alright. Now, tell me about the investigation

111370004.text: It hid in a Snow Drift this time. Nothing special

111370005.text: Huh? That's it? Ah... I was expecting something extraordinary!

111370006.text: It was concealed in the cold and ice... As if proclaiming some sort of destiny and omen!

111370007.text: Oh, it was hiding in a Snow Drift, huh? That's pretty cold resistant...

111370008.text: Come back soon and don't catch a cold! Cover up and get warm, I'll call out for you when there's a reading!

111370009.text: I ran into some clues about that Trotter you mentioned last time. We can probably get some deeper insights by combining it with your findings this time
